Key Match Events: Lockie Ferguson took 3 wickets for 49 runs
Kane Williamson scored 78 runs before retiring hurt
Daryl Mitchell scored 89 runs not out
New Zealand won by 8 wickets (with 43 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Lockie Ferguson was awarded Player of the Match

Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand elected to field first
